posts.post_content: Will pay at lest $500-600'each for non damaged non altered T5 Pinkerton cabinets(non Philadelphia Athletics) on cardboard mounts. (Paying less for paper and Philly As but still interested.)

Glyn,
Are you interested in the postcard types...I have two on ebay currently...

[url]http://www.ebay.com/itm/121400730268?ssPageName=STRK:MESELX:IT&_trksid=p3984.m1555.l2649[/url]

[url]http://www.ebay.com/itm/121400731675?ssPageName=STRK:MESELX:IT&_trksid=p3984.m1555.l2649[/url]

Let me know...maybe we can work something out.

Joshua
I am only interested in the Cabinets not the post cards.  Thank You for the offer.
Hello....trying to find out if a Barney Pelty exists for the Pinkerton T5 set...have you seen one? Thanks, Michael.
